Summary: Login page is slow on mobile
Description: Users are complaining that the login page takes 5-10 seconds to load on mobile devices. This is causing frustration and some users are abandoning the login process.
Multiple customers have requested a dark mode option for the dashboard. This would improve usability during evening hours.
When users try to export reports to PDF the download fails with a 500 error. This is blocking several enterprise customers.
Users find the current dashboard charts hard to understand. They want clearer labels and better color coding.
Product managers want to upload multiple feedback files at once instead of one at a time. Current process is too slow.
The search function returns irrelevant results. Users expect to find feedback by keywords but results don't match.
Users want to receive email notifications when new insights are generated from their uploaded feedback.
The mobile app crashes when users try to view detailed analysis on iOS devices running version 17+.
New users are confused about how to get started. Need a better onboarding tutorial or wizard.
Teams want to receive analysis summaries directly in their Slack channels instead of checking the dashboard.
Exporting large datasets (10000+ rows) takes over 5 minutes. Users expect this to be faster.
Multiple team members want to collaborate on the same analysis with comments and annotations.
Dashboard charts fail to render on Firefox browser. Works fine on Chrome and Safari.
